news.title: Mandelas long walk to freedom ... was apparently assisted by Thatcher
news.summary: According to newly released papers, the former prime minister proposed a huge aid programme to help secure his release.

news.title: Revealed: Margaret Thatcher’s 'Marshall Plan for southern Africa'
news.summary: Margaret Thatcher wooed the South African government with promises of a “Marshall Plan for southern Africa” and helped “save” the independence of Namibia, according to newly released papers.

news.title: How apartheid SA caved in to release Nelson Mandela | The New Age
news.summary: Margaret Thatcher wooed the apartheid government with promises of a Marshall Plan for southern Africa and helped “save” the independence of Namibia, according to newly released papers.

news.title: Thatcher's 'Marshall Plan for southern Africa' - The Namibian
news.summary: • MARTIN PLAUT MARGARET Thatcher wooed the South African government with promises of a “Marshall Plan for southern Africa” and helped “save” the independence of Namibia, according to newly released papers.

news.title: Tam Dalyell never held office, but he was Margaret Thatcher's sternest critic
news.summary: That he was singular – from the name onwards – and also a great parliamentary character are both true, but they do not get one very far in appreciating Tam Dalyell.
